title: MIDTOWN STUDIO'S 1 BEDS 2 BEDS 3 BEDS
posting_body: LOOOKING TO MOVE TO MIDTOWN WHERE EVERYTHING IS WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE AND SAFE LOOK NO FURTHER.
WE HAVE A WIDE VERITY OF APARTMENTS.
WE ASK THAT ONLY SERIOUS INQUIRIES CONTACT
YOU CAN CALL TO SCHEDULE A TOUR @
I HAVE MONDAY-FRIDAY FROM 2PM-6PM OUR OFFICE IS LOCATED AT 27E. WILLIS ST. 48201.
WE ASK THAT WHEN YOU COME IN YOU ARE READY LIKE EVERYONE ELSE HAVE PHOTO I.D, PROOF OF INCOME PREFERABLY
YOUR LAST 3 PAY STUBS, AND ALWAYS HAVE A DEPOSIT HANDY INCASE YOU SEE A UNIT YOU LIKE YOU CAN LOCK IT DOWN AN SECURE IT!
OUR UNITS START AT $1100 AND GO UP TO $2,500
